Posts.Content: Dec 2, 2016 06:16PM Terriinsacto wrote: I am HER2 positive also and I had a MUGA scan before my first treatment, I was told it was to see if your heart can handle the Herceptin, I was also told that I will have one every 3 months as long as I am getting Herceptin. I am doing the 12 week Taxol/ Herceptin and then continue with Herceptin for the remainder 9 months
